SKT_FIRST.name: Dropping the Beat!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the ally with the lowest current Health by <color=#28d9ed>5%</color> of the target's Max Health.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Effects are applied to all allies

description: Attacks an enemy and <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the ally with the lowest current Health by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000038_1_1]</color> of the target's Max Health.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>5%</color> 회복시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、残りHPが最も低い味方単体の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>5%</color>回復させる。

SKT_SECOND.name: Let's Get the Party Started!

5_jp: すべての強化効果解除

SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 対象の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>解除する。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: It's Party Time!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Heals all allies by <color=#28d9ed>5%</color> and removes <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>debuff(s)</color>. The healing is increased by <color=#28d9ed>5%</color> on targets inflicted with a debuff.
description: Heals all allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000038_3_1]</color> and removes <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000038_3_3]</color> <color=#28d9ed>debuff(s)</color>. The healing is increased by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000038_3_1]</color> on targets inflicted with a debuff.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 아군 전체의 체력을 <color=#28d9ed>5%</color> 회복시키고 <color=#28d9ed>약화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 해제시킵니다. 약화 효과를 보유한 대상은 회복량이 추가로 <color=#28d9ed>5%</color> 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 味方全体のHPを<color=#28d9ed>5%</color>回復させ、<color=#28d9ed>弱体効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>解除する。弱体効果がある対象は、HP回復量が<color=#28d9ed>5%</color>UPする。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, heals the ally with the lowest Health. The amount of healing is proportional to the target's Max Health.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the ally with the lowest Health. The amount of healing is proportional to the caster's Max Health.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, heals the ally with the lowest Health. The amount of healing is proportional to the target's Max Health.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the ally with the lowest Health. The amount of healing is proportional to the caster's Max Health.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 가장 체력 상황이 나쁜 아군의 체력을 회복합니다. 회복량은 대상의 최대 체력에 비례합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 회복시킵니다. 회복량은 자신의 최대 체력에 비례합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、残りHPが最も低い味方単体のHPを回復する。回復量は対象の最大HPが高いほどUPする。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、残りHPが最も低い味方単体の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を回復させる。回復量は自分の最大HPが高いほどUPする。
